DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate multiple dose pharmacokinetics , safety , tolerability two dose strength varenicline adolescent age 12 16 year regularly smoke least three cigarette per day .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Study Evaluate Pharmacokinetics Multiple Doses Varenicline Healthy Adolescent Smokers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female adolescent ( 12 16 year inclusive ) total body weight great 30 kg currently smoke average least 3 cigarette per day . Male female subject positive urine drug screen female subject positive pregnancy test .
